headlines.headline: Sources: Pistons' Jalen Duren joins NBA slam dunk contest
headlines.description: Pistons center Jalen Duren, a first-time All-Star, will participate in the NBA slam dunk contest at All-Star Weekend in Los Angeles, sources told ESPN.

headlines.headline: Would it be a mistake for Clippers to move Harden? Stephen A. weighs in
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith reacts to the Clippers and James Harden exploring a trade.

headlines.headline: NBA players with the most points and no championships
headlines.description: Karl Malone scored the most points in NBA history without winning a ring. Check out which other top scorers haven't taken home championships.

headlines.headline: NBA buzz: Live updates, trades, intel ahead of Feb. 5 deadline
headlines.description: Is the former MVP on the move again? Catch up on what we're hearing from insiders ahead of Thursday's deadline.

headlines.headline: NBA trade deadline: Latest intel, teams to watch in final two days
headlines.description: With just two days until the deadline, which players and teams are Tim Bontemps and Brian Windhorst watching?

headlines.headline: Perk rips Clippers for exploring Harden trade
headlines.description: Kendrick Perkins rips the Clippers for not being able to keep James Harden happy and discusses which team should look to trade for him.

headlines.headline: Stephen A. appalled by Kraft's HOF snub, wonders what it means for Brady
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith voices his unhappiness over Robert Kraft not making the Pro Football Hall of Fame and wonders if Tom Brady will be a first-ballot Hall of Famer.

headlines.headline: Sources: Giants to hire Matt Nagy as offensive coordinator
headlines.description: The Giants will hire Matt Nagy as their offensive coordinator, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

headlines.headline: Are the Giants a good landing spot for Matt Nagy?
headlines.description: The "Get Up" crew reacts to the Giants' decision to hire Matt Nagy as their offensive coordinator.

headlines.headline: Should Eagles and A.J. Brown part ways?
headlines.description: Mike Greenberg and the "Get Up" crew discuss A.J. Brown's future with the Philadelphia Eagles.

headlines.headline: Why Pickens should push for long-term deal rather than franchise tag
headlines.description: Jason McCourty and Jeff Saturday agree George Pickens should push to sign a long-term deal instead of settling for a franchise tag from the Cowboys.

headlines.headline: Are the Buffalo Bills entering their 'villain era'?
headlines.description: The "Get Up" crew discusses Bills GM Brandon Beane's response to criticism surrounding the promotion of Joe Brady to head coach.

headlines.headline: Who has the most game-winning goals in NHL history?
headlines.description: Here's a look at the players with the most game-winning goals in NHL history.

headlines.headline: Sharks take losing streak into matchup with the Avalanche
headlines.description: San Jose Sharks (27-23-4, in the Pacific Division) vs. Colorado Avalanche (36-9-9, in the Central Division)

headlines.description: Ottawa Senators (27-21-7, in the Atlantic Division) vs. Carolina Hurricanes (34-15-6, in the Metropolitan Division)
